articles.title: India offered three AFC competition slots for 2023-24; qualifier schedule announced - ESPN India
articles.description: Qualifiers for 2023-24 AFC competitions for Indian clubs will be played between April 4 to May 3.

articles.title: Sainz: Ferrari will play a 'better game' at less extreme tracks than Bahrain - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Carlos Sainz reckons Ferrari can “play a better game” to battle Red Bull in future Formula 1 races after failing to challenge its 2022 rival team for victory in Bahrain.
